name: Use of funds in relation to federal projects
text:
The funds allocated to this part shall be expended by the Hawaii housing finance and development administration only upon the finding that the housing project found necessary does not qualify for federal aid or participation. [L 1961, c 189, §11; Supp, §98P-11; HRS ; am L 1986, c 339, §14; am L 1987, c 337, §9(2); am L 1997, c 350, §14; am L 2005, c 196, §26(b)]  Cross References
  Public lands for disaster relief, see §171-93.
